artist: Editor: Chris Boarts Larson; Publisher: Slug & Lettuce, Richmond, Va.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, with an illustration of figures holding (and one painting) a banner that reads "SLUG AND LETTUCE," with one figure on the back of a tortoise, with text and an image of a performer below; 16 pp.
medium: Offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Slug & Lettuce #84
